Saturday.description: Staggered boxed-lunches while each staff member is at designated stations and all lanyards are ready for students. Staff should also know to re-route students with missing paperwork to Director.
Saturday.title: Déjeuner & Arrivée des élèves

Saturday.description: Ceremony during which Dr. Harris, Dr. Kuettner, and the Academy staff introduce themselves and the program to parents and students.
Saturday.title: Cérémonie d'ouverture

Saturday.description: In the Black Box, explain the rules of the Academy in Franglais after which staff and students sign the oath.
Saturday.title: Bienvenue & Inscriptions

Saturday.description: Students and staff write their name on their table card and draw three things about them on the back. Then, each person introduces themself to the group.
Saturday.title: Etiquettes & Presentations

Saturday.description: 5 students per table with 1 staff member. Staff will engage them in conversation and encourage them to speak.
Saturday.title: Dîner

Saturday.description: With music in the background, students sign up for the week's activities.
Saturday.title: Inscriptions

Saturday.description: Variety of games: animal cries, gordian knot, passing the hoop, and trainwreck.
Saturday.title: Jeux brise glace

Saturday.description: Time for students to continue getting to know each other informally. Thay can play instruments, card games, board games, physical games, and just chat in general.
Saturday.title: Soirée jeux

Sunday.description: Combine tables so there can be 10 students per table with a teacher and RA.
Sunday.staff: all RAs, teachers may leave early
Sunday.title: Petit-déjeuner

Sunday.description: Students who requested to attend church will be chaperoned at their services. For the others, staff will have games prepared.
Sunday.title: Jeux & Églises

Sunday.description: 5 students per table with 1 staff member. Staff will engage them in conversation and encourage them to speak.
Sunday.title: Déjeuner

Sunday.description: Daily half-hour to write in their journals, answer their letter, and/or record a vlog of their exeprience thus far.
Sunday.title: Journal / Vlog quotidien

Sunday.description: Per student choice, 1h30 of choir, blog, radio, art, and maybe dance.
Sunday.title: Ateliers Creatifs

Sunday.description: Students will partake in one of 5 activities of their choosing.
Sunday.title: Activités au choix

Sunday.description: A conversation hour with the RAs (10 students per RA) on varying topics.
Sunday.title: Heure de conversation

Sunday.description: 5 students per table with 1 staff member. Staff will engage them in conversation and encourage them to speak.
Sunday.title: Dîner

Sunday.description: Costume night during which we play games and try to guess who everyone is. Staff will come to dinner with part of their costume on, but students will not be obligated to.
Sunday.title: Soirée Déguisée
